DOC.brief_title: Frontier Registry II Bifurcation Stent System Registry
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study assess performance Abbott Vascular MULTI-LINK FRONTIER Coronary Bifurcation Stent System ( CBSS ) one six month clinical outcome , use bifurcation de novo restenotic lesion treatment . The device allow stent implant main branch simultaneous preservation access side branch balloon dilatation stenting indicate .
DOC.criteria: Other lesion different epicardial vessel must successfully treat prior bifurcation procedure . Native parent vessel suitable receive least 2.5mm x 18mm FRONTIER stent ( > 2.5mm < 4.0mm diameter side branch > 2.0mm ) lesion length < 15mm determined visual assessment . Target main branch vessel must major epicardial native vessel . Appropriate lesion morphology . Target lesion restenosis follow original treatment PTCA ( instent restenosis ) . Estimated artery reference diameter < 2.5mm Patients diffuse disease define long segment abnormal vessel without interposed area normal vessel Target lesion contain thrombus . Target lesion aortoostial leave main stem location . Untreated lesion > 50 % diameter stenosis proximal distal target lesion plan target lesion intervention . Patients contraindication antiplatelet / anticoagulation therapy . Target lesion distal previously place stent . Fibrotic calcify lesion predilated .
